  • 基础用法

SearchForm 查询表单

SchemaForm 组件的配置全部可用，这里仅列举调用示例。

基础用法

查询表单的用法展示。

请选择下拉选择框
请选择级联选择
<template>
  <it-search-form
    :initValues="formData"
    :labelWidth="80"
    :baseColProps="{
      span: 12
    }"
    :schemas="schemas"
    :submitOnReset="true"
    @submit="onSubmit"
    @reset="onReset"
  />
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        formData: {},
        schemas: [
          {
            prop: 'input',
            label: '输入框',
            component: 'Input'
          },
          {
            prop: 'select',
            label: '下拉选择框',
            component: 'Select',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '选项一',
                  value: 1
                },
                {
                  label: '选项二',
                  value: 2
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'switch',
            label: '开关',
            component: 'Switch'
          },
          {
            prop: 'radioGroup',
            label: '单选框',
            component: 'RadioGroup',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '选项一',
                  value: 1
                },
                {
                  label: '选项二',
                  value: 2
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'checkboxGroup',
            label: '复选框',
            component: 'CheckboxGroup',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '选项一',
                  value: 1
                },
                {
                  label: '选项二',
                  value: 2
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'cascader',
            label: '级联选择',
            component: 'Cascader',
            componentProps: {
              options: [
                {
                  label: '上海',
                  value: 'shanghai',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'shixiaqu',
                      label: '市辖区',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'pudong',
                          label: '浦东新区',
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  value: 'zhejiang',
                  label: '浙江',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'hangzhou',
                      label: '杭州',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'yuhang',
                          label: '余杭区'
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                },
                {
                  value: 'jiangsu',
                  label: '江苏',
                  children: [
                    {
                      value: 'nanjing',
                      label: '南京',
                      children: [
                        {
                          value: 'qinhuai',
                          label: '秦淮区'
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'datePicker',
            label: '日期',
            component: 'DatePicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '100%'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'monthPicker',
            label: '月份',
            component: 'MonthPicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '100%'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'rangePicker',
            label: '时间范围',
            component: 'RangePicker'
          },
          {
            prop: 'weekPicker',
            label: '周',
            component: 'WeekPicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '100%'
              }
            }
          },
          {
            prop: 'timePicker',
            label: '时间',
            component: 'TimePicker',
            componentProps: {
              style: {
                width: '100%'
              }
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    methods: {
      onSubmit(values) {
        console.log('submit:', values)
      },
      onReset(values) {
        console.log('reset:', values)
      }
    }
  }
</script>
